thread.title: Kayali launches four new body sprays in best-selling scents for £39 each
thread.title_full: Kayali launches four new body sprays in best-selling scents for £39 each

title: Kayali launches four new body sprays in best-selling scents for £39 each
text:
Four of the most popular scents from the classic brand have been rereleased in a body spray format for a limited time only Kayali is known for their iconic eau de parfums but the popular brand has branched out into body sprays with a release of four limited-edition bottles. The scents aren't completely new, with the new format being available in fan favourites of Vanilla, Yum Pistachio Gelato, Lovefest Burning Cherry and Déjà Vu White Flower.
The new mists are available at a number of retailers, including Sephora, Boots, Cult Beauty and the Huda Beauty website. The 125ml bottles offer the best value for money of the entire Kayali range. The sprays feature a continuous nozzle that means it keeps going until you're ready for it to stop.
Vanilla 28 is Kayali's classic go to scent, it boasts a proud blend of vanilla, brown sugar and tonka notes to deliver a mature and addictive vanilla note. In an eau de parfum it's been considered one of the best vanillas on the market for layering and we're certain as a body…
